title: Penne, tomato and mozzarella salad
ingredients: ['350g penne pasta', '60ml olive oil', '1 bunch spring onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '150g quartered cherry tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '140g mozzarella cheese, diced', '40g grated Parmesan cheese', '4 ounces fresh basil', '12 large black olives, halved']
